content: my mossy castles are inspired by moomin s wonderfully whimsical house and ancient scottish castles with their fairy filled grounds in order to keep it delightfully whimsical i decided to display my castle in a moss filled tea cup the castle is a quick easy knit it is knit in the round on dpns in 2 pieces and then sewn together embroidery is used for the windows and door supplies stuffing toothpicks to help your castle stand teacup and moss > **praise for mossy fairy castle** > > very quick and easy knit so cute > adente 2 > > this could be one of the cutest things > ever procastonlater 3 1 https //www ravelry com/discuss/wee-folk-valley/4343195/1-25 2 https //www ravelry com/projects/adente/mossy-fairy-castle 3 https //www ravelry com/projects/procastonlater/mossy-fairy-castle
